name: Need A Hero
description:
Gear up, team up with your donkey companion and set off on a magical odyssey filled with humour, intense battles and fierce competition! Try to solve puzzles in 60 seconds against other players in Arcade mode, or embark on a long quest to rescue the princess. We need a hero, so be one!

A long time ago, in a kingdom far away, a young man took up his trusty sword and set out on a journey to slay a terrible dragon and save a princess as beautiful as she is rich. With every step, his path was blocked by loathsome creatures and monsters, but he was strong. By putting troll heads together in long, repeated series, he created incredible combinations that annihilated the beasts and cleared his way to the dragon. In the end, of course, he saved the princess, killed the dragon, and received half the kingdom as a reward. This is the fate of every hero!

  • Combine three monsters in a unique combat system!

  • An exciting Arcade Mode and tough Challenges for heroes willing to push their limits!

  • Relaxing and rewarding levels that prepare you for the journey ahead!

  • Stunning graphics and a breathtaking soundtrack!

  • Countless epic spells and powers to use against your enemies!

  • Different types of monsters, each with special abilities and specific strategies!

  • Tournaments that allow matches between friends and heroes from around the world!

  • Chance to progress through the leagues, from wood to diamond, and become the ultimate champion.

  • The most heroic game EVER!

  • Play for free for an unlimited time!

Like our Facebook page for updates, screenshots and trailers!
